entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
